name: @djs-user/collection
description: Collection Class for the Discord.js User Package

scripts.test:
npm run build; echo 'Running Test

'; node test/index.test.js
scripts.ci: npm install; npm update; rm -rf ./node_modules; rm ./package-lock.json; npm install;
scripts.pretty:
echo 'Prettifying Source'; npx prettier --write ./src/**; echo '
Prettifying Tests'; npx prettier --write ./test/**/*;
scripts.docgen:
echo 'Generating Docs Files
'; rm -rf ./docs; npx typedoc --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json; echo ''
scripts.ready: npm run ci; npm run pretty; npm run build; npm run docgen

author: TBHGodPro
